name: Don't Choke!
description:
Help Stanley get back at the school bully by defeating him in a rap battle!

I made this game in 72 hours, using Adventure Creator and Unity, as my entry to the Ludum Dare 32 Game Jam, for which the theme is 'an unconventional weapon'.

This is the first game I've ever released. I recently quit my job to work full time making my own point-and-click adventure game, and saw the Ludum Dare as an opportunity to get some practice and feedback.

Dialogue can be skipped through by clicking anywhere on the screen.

CHROME USERS: Google have disabled the Unity plugin in their latest update; to fix this, you can past the following link into your browser and enable NPAPI: chrome://flags/#enable-npapi
